title: The Biden Bias Is Growing | Guests: Shelley Luther & Chad Prather | 4/27/20
description:
The media’s bias toward Joe Biden is getting worse as new evidence emerges from an old Larry King Live episode … which Google has since removed. Glenn runs through the shockingly different timelines of the media’s sexual allegation coverage of Brett Kavanaugh vs. Biden. Are you tired of homeschooling yet? Glenn gives an update on the coming meat shortage and what we must responsibly prepare for moving forward. Dallas salon owner Shelley Luther joins to explain why she’s reopening her business, despite a cease-and-desist order. Nancy Pelosi now claims Trump’s China travel ban didn’t go far enough. BlazeTV’s Chad Prather gives a look at his new exposé, “One Nation Under Surveillance,” and how intrusive American surveillance now is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
